name: Plop Saga
description:
This is a pixel style single player action adventure game, which tells the story of a fantasy adventure of little water drop 'Plop' aimed at saving the forest. Players operate simply, just need to control the direction and choose the right time to jump and jump. Each level of adventure does not count the number of failures. You can repeat the gameplay indefinitely, No Pressure.

Content
The game contains five different style scenes, each scene contains seven levels The level design is interesting, and some of them are challenging.

Beautiful Music
The BGM of the game is soothing and beautiful. It is suitable for wearing headphones and immersive game experience.

Collect Blue Fire
This is a little challenge in the game. There is a blue fire waiting for players to collect in each level. It should be noted that after the blue fire is collected, the game after this level cannot fail; If you fail, you need to collect the blue fire again.

Save Point
Considering the player's game experience, there is a save point for each level. If you fail, you can restart the game from the save point.
